CustomField.formula: If ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Open"),(Today() - DateValue(CreatedDate) - 2*(floor ((Today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24)) /7) - floor(( DateValue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))), ( DateValue(Closed_Date__c) - DateValue(CreatedDate) -2*(floor(( DateValue(Closed_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(( DateValue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Discrepancy Age
